title: What are your views on the Bhojpuri language? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, I like it. Everyone likes their own language, lives. I love it because it is sweet, my relatives speak it and it is one of the language of Bihar. But I like Maithili language more. Because I live in Mithila, it is my mother language. Don't believe on the tone of Maithili language shown in you tube video made by dumbs to make money. Maithili is one of the total 23 official language of India. Others are Assamese, Bodo, Gujarati, Kannada, sanskrit,Urdu, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu etc.

Bhojpuri is language of bihaar. Bhojpuri language is very sweet language and if you heard bhojpuri its feel like respect and familir to us. Bhojpuri is not much popular but bhojpuri songs are fire in whole world, peoples from america and so many countries love some bhojpuri songs and their beats and also try to sing. Kamariya kare lapalap lolipop lagelu type of songs are in top i dont think any indian has missed this song.
